languages.text: Высокий фактотум сообщил, что Соломон провалил миссию Адептус Арбитес и был разжалован. Чтобы вернуть его в свиту, Вольному Торговцу нужно отправиться на Веабос-6.
The High Factotum reports that Solomorne has been demoted after failing an Adeptus Arbites mission. Bringing him back into the retinue will require the Rogue Trader to travel to Vheabos VI.
languages.original_text: Высокий фактотум сообщил, что Соломон провалил миссию Адептус Арбитес и был разжалован. Чтобы вернуть его в свиту, Вольному Торговцу нужно отправиться на Веабос-6.

traits.locale_text: The High Factotum reports that Solomorne has been demoted after failing an Adeptus Arbites mission. Bringing him back into the retinue requires the Rogue Trader to travel to Vheabos VI.

The High Factotum reports that Solomorne has been demoted after failing an Adeptus Arbites mission. Bringing him back into the retinue will require the Rogue Trader to travel to Vheabos VI.

languages.text: Das Hoch-Faktotum berichtet, dass Solomorne nach dem Scheitern einer Mission der Adeptus Arbites degradiert wurde. Um ihn ins Gefolge zurückzuholen, muss {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} nach Vheabos-VI reisen.
languages.original_text: The High Factotum reports that Solomorne has been demoted after failing an Adeptus Arbites mission. Bringing him back into the retinue will require the Rogue Trader to travel to Vheabos VI.

traits.locale_text: Das Hoch-Faktotum berichtet, dass Solomorne nach dem Scheitern einer Mission der Adeptus Arbites degradiert wurde. Um ihn ins Gefolge zurückzuholen, muss {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} nach Vheabos-VI reisen.

languages.text: Le haut factotum a signalé que Solomorne avait été rétrogradé après son échec lors d'une mission de l'Adeptus Arbites. Pour le réintégrer à son entourage, {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} va devoir se rendre sur Vhéabos-VI.
languages.original_text: The High Factotum reports that Solomorne has been demoted after failing an Adeptus Arbites mission. Bringing him back into the retinue will require the Rogue Trader to travel to Vheabos VI.

traits.locale_text: Le haut factotum a signalé que Solomorne avait été rétrogradé après son échec lors d'une mission de l'Adeptus Arbites. Pour le réintégrer à son entourage, {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} va devoir se rendre sur Vhéabos-VI.

languages.text: 高阶顾问报告说，索罗蒙未能顺利执行法务部的任务，行动失败后遭到了降职。行商浪人需要前往维博斯六号星，让索罗蒙重新回到队伍之中。
languages.original_text: The High Factotum reports that Solomorne has been demoted after failing an Adeptus Arbites mission. Bringing him back into the retinue will require the Rogue Trader to travel to Vheabos VI.

traits.locale_text: 高阶顾问报告说，索罗蒙未能顺利执行法务部的任务，行动失败后遭到了降职。行商浪人需要前往维博斯六号星，让索罗蒙重新回到队伍之中。

languages.text: El Sumo Factótum informa de que Solomorne ha sido degradado tras fracasar en una misión del Adeptus Arbites. Para devolverlo a su séquito, {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente debe viajar a Vheabos VI.
languages.original_text: The High Factotum reports that Solomorne has been demoted after failing an Adeptus Arbites mission. Bringing him back into the retinue will require the Rogue Trader to travel to Vheabos VI.

traits.locale_text: El Sumo Factótum informa de que Solomorne ha sido degradado tras fracasar en una misión del Adeptus Arbites. Para devolverlo a su séquito, {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente debe viajar a Vheabos VI.

languages.text: ハイ・ファクトタムは、ソロモーンが高等裁定局の任務に失敗したため降格されたと報告した。彼を随行に復帰させるには、ローグトレーダーがヴィアボス・VIへ赴く必要がある。
languages.original_text: The High Factotum reports that Solomorne has been demoted after failing an Adeptus Arbites mission. Bringing him back into the retinue will require the Rogue Trader to travel to Vheabos VI.

traits.locale_text: ハイ・ファクトタムは、ソロモーンが高等裁定局の任務に失敗したため降格されたと報告した。彼を随行に復帰させるには、ローグトレーダーがヴィアボス・VIへ赴く必要がある。

languages.text: Arşıkâhya, Solomorne'un Adeptus Arbites vazifesini yerine getiremediği için rütbesinin düşürüldüğünü bildirdi. Onu yeniden maiyete dâhil etmek için Hür Tacir'in Vheabos VI'ya seyahat etmesi gerekecek.
languages.original_text: The High Factotum reports that Solomorne has been demoted after failing an Adeptus Arbites mission. Bringing him back into the retinue will require the Rogue Trader to travel to Vheabos VI.

traits.locale_text: Arşıkâhya, Solomorne'un Adeptus Arbites vazifesini yerine getiremediği için rütbesinin düşürüldüğünü bildirdi. Onu yeniden maiyete dâhil etmek için Hür Tacir'in Vheabos VI'ya seyahat etmesi gerekecek.
